tool_description: Filters accommodations based on required and preferred amenities, supporting complex amenity matching logic.

property_ids.description: List of property IDs to filter by amenities

required_amenities.description: Amenities that must be present (e.g., wifi, parking, pool, gym, pet_friendly)

preferred_amenities.description: Amenities that are nice to have but not required

excluded_amenities.description: Amenities that should not be present

match_strategy.description: How to handle preferred amenities: 'any', 'all', or 'score'

error_messages: Empty property list: Provide at least one property ID to filter.
Invalid amenities: Use standard amenity names like wifi, parking, pool, gym, breakfast, pet_friendly, spa, restaurant, bar, laundry, fitness_center, business_center.
Invalid match strategy: Use 'any', 'all', or 'score' for match_strategy.
Conflicting amenities: An amenity cannot be both required and excluded.
Properties not found: Some property IDs could not be located in the amenity database.
usage: Provide property_ids and specify required_amenities (must have), preferred_amenities (nice to have), and/or excluded_amenities (must not have). Set match_strategy to control how preferred amenities are handled.

filtered_property_ids.description: Property IDs that meet the amenity criteria

amenity_scores.description: Amenity match scores for filtered properties (0-100)

excluded_count.description: Number of properties excluded by amenity filter

filter_summary.description: Summary of applied amenity filters and results
